title: New: Someone – The Deep
body:
_The Deep_, the debut single from the Netherland’s Tessa Rose Jackson aka **Someone** almost has a Slowdive or My Bloody Valentine edge to the vocal line, which is always awesome in my books.

Lifted from a forthcoming EP of the same name, The Deep is a simply beautiful composition, that blossoms elegantly throughout it’s four minutes. Check it out below.
